summary: Relating to the regulation and licensing of taxicabs (for-hire) drivers; repealing Seattle Municipal Code (SMC) sections 6.212.110, 6.212.119, and 6.212.200; amending SMC sections 6.212.010, 6.212.070, 6.212.115, 6.212.118; and adding a new "sunset" provision, SMC section 6.212.230, effective July 31, 1986.
